item.title: Treasury Yields Inch Higher With Focus on Trump Presidency
item.author: Bloomberg News (English)
item.description: (Bloomberg) -- US Treasuries opened weaker as investors looked to rekindle the selloff spurred by Donald Trump’s presidential victory last week. Yields on the 10-year benchmark bond rose three basis points to 4.33% in early Asian trading on Tuesday. Cash markets were closed on Monday for a US holida...

item.title: Bond Investors Set Up for Jump in Yields With Focus on Trump
item.author: Bloomberg News (English)
item.description: (Bloomberg) -- US Treasuries are set to open weaker as investors look to rekindle the selloff spurred by Donald Trump’s presidential victory last week. Ten-year Treasury note futures fell by about 11 ticks as of 3:30 p.m. New York time on Monday with cash markets closed for a US holiday, implying a ...
